Title: Than Tuong
Writer: Gia Doan (story), Quang Huy, Phan Xine Linh (script doctor), Le Thang (story), Ngo Phuoc Truong
Actors: Pham Quynh Anh, Tram Anh, Phi Dieu, Nguyen Hau
Plot: Tri, a romantic and idealistic music producer, finds himself in a talent raising competition against Minh, an aggressive and pragmatic producer. During this race, Tri falls in love with Linh, his singer and only ticket to dreamland.
